IP_SYN_2_style_7:
[Indication]
Dyspnea/Hypoxia due to Pulmonary Alveolar Proteinosis.
[Anesthesia]
General, Left DLT.
[Description]
Left whole lung lavage performed. 8L warm saline instilled in aliquots with chest physiotherapy. Drainage progressed from cloudy/sediment-rich to clear. DLT removed.
[Plan]
ICU admission for respiratory monitoring.
